main event: A sighting of an elongated, spindle-shaped object with high reflectivity was reported in Independence, Kentucky in October 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed moving from the horizon over the observer's shoulder at a high rate of speed,The observer reported a sighting duration of approximately 10 to 15 seconds,It was described to appear light grayish-white in color and larger than a star,The sighting took place at high altitude and could not be associated with any known aircraft,Witness reports indicated previous sightings of similarly shaped objects in 1965.
witness description: Gordon Austin, age 18, observed the object while watching TV at home.
